ygData.msgSnippet: well i m on Mithaniel Marr right now.. starting a char on Firiona Vie though soon.. I really wish everybody roleplayed more..  Mortoner says, in Elvish,
ygData.messageBody:
well i'm on Mithaniel Marr right now.. starting a char on Firiona Vie though soon.. I really wish everybody roleplayed more.. <sigh>

Mortoner says, in Elvish, "M'Lady, I beg of you to grant me the spirit of wolf.. I have a long journey ahead of me across treacherous lands.."

--or--

Dikinmyazz tells you, "d00d, can i geta SOW"

hmmm...

-
Adarel WindSinger
Mithaniel Marr
Druid of Tunare of the 22nd moon
